Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: $[if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 0) { return "There are no visible exits from here.";} else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 1) { return "There is a single exit that heads " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 2) { return "The exits from here head to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 3) { return "The exits from here head to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 7) { return "The exits from here head to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 8) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 9) { return "The exits from here head to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 10) { return "The exits from here head to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[9])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else { return "There are multiple exits available."; }]

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ The sounds of \{distant\|heavy\|dragging\} footsteps reach your ear. \| A silky cobweb thread brushes your \{cheek\|shoulder\|arm\|face\}. \| The \{stench\|odor\} of \{rotting\|decaying\|putrid\} flesh penetrates your nose. \| You feel something \{land\|drop\} on your \{head\|shoulder\} before scurrying off hastily. \| The sounds of \{distant\|heavy\|dragging\} footsteps reach your ear. \| A silky cobweb thread brushes your \{cheek\|shoulder\|arm\}. \| The \{stench\|odor\} of \{rotting\|decaying\|putrid\} flesh penetrates your nose. \| You feel something \{land\|drop\} on your \{head\|shoulder\} before scurrying off hastily. \| The echoes of \{distant\|remote\|far off\} \{noises\|sounds\} \{die\|fade\|vanish\|dissolve\} slowly away. \| You hear a loud crunch as something crumbles under your feet. \| The \{dry\|chilled\|cool\|cold\|stagnant\} air moves around you suddenly, filling your nostrils with the \{unmistakable\|clear\|distinct\|marked\} \{stench\|odor\} of decay. \| A \{tiny\|chitinous\|sinuous\} insect with \{many\|numerous\|a multitude of\} legs scurries over some old bones. \| For a brief moment, \{absolute\|still\|heavy\|oppressive\} silence fills the area as life itself seems to hold its breath. \| Something \{unseen\|indiscernible\|imperceptible\|indistinguishable\} \{skitters\|scurries\} over your feet. \| \{Many\|Numerous\|A dozen\|Eight\} glowing red eyes seem to \{stare\|glare\} at you from the \{dark shadows\|shadows\} before suddenly disappearing. \| In the distance you hear what sounds like \{cracking\|shifting\|rattling\} bones before the \{heavy\|still\|oppressive\} silence again surrounds you. \| \{An \{old\|atrophied\}\|A dusty\} skull on the floor seems to \{grin\|smile\} at you. \}
